tool_description:
Unlock AI-Powered Resume Parsing.
Highly Accurate. Multilingual.
Best resume parser api.
name: resumetsy
title: resumetsy

api_list.name: /api/coverletter
api_list.description:
Endpoint Name: Personalized Cover Letter Generator

Endpoint Description: The /api/coverletter endpoint is a cutting-edge Personalized Cover Letter Generator that empowers users to create tailored cover letters based on their resume and a provided job description. This intelligent endpoint operates exclusively with PDF files, accepting those that are less than 10 MB in size and span up to two pages in length.

Using advanced AI algorithms, the Personalized Cover Letter Generator analyzes the content of the uploaded resume and the inputted job description to craft a compelling and customized cover letter. By extracting key qualifications and experiences from the resume and aligning them with the specific requirements outlined in the job description, this endpoint generates a cover letter that effectively showcases the candidate's suitability for the position.

api_list.name: /api/translate
api_list.description:
The /api/translate endpoint is a sophisticated Multilingual PDF-to-JSON Translator designed to handle resumes in PDF format and convert them into JSON representations while also providing the option to translate the content into other languages

only accepts PDF files that are less than 10 MB in size and contain a maximum of two pages.

api_list.name: /api/parseresume
api_list.description:
The /api/parseresume endpoint allows users to upload a resume in PDF format, and it automatically converts the PDF content into a JSON format, providing a structured representation of the resume's information. This endpoint is useful for extracting and processing data from resumes programmatically, enabling seamless integration with other applications and systems that require structured data for further analysis and processing.

only accepts PDF files that are less than 10 MB in size and have a maximum of two pages.
